entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as someone who had scribbled a message in Harry's birthday card. She is also mentioned to be with Ron at the Burrow.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as someone who is with Hermione at the Burrow and is receiving birthday presents from Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story and is feeling angry and left out because he is stuck in Privet Drive while Ron and Hermione are having fun at the Burrow.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric is mentioned as someone who was murdered by Voldemort in a graveyard.

relationships.description: Harry is angry at Ron for having fun at the Burrow without him.
Harry is also angry at Hermione for being with Ron and not including him in their activities.
Ron is receiving birthday presents from Harry, which he had thrown away unopened.
